name: psicoia-pro
description: Gerador de relatórios psicológicos com IA

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev:simple: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev:simple" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env

author: Gabriel
